meta.description: Analysis of dangers and benefits of the covid 19 vaccines, including CDC information, reports, graphs, and tables.

title: Covid
cleaned_text:
The Covid 19 epidemic has affected the entire world. Economies have been badly affected. Countless people have lost their jobs. To fight the spread of the sickness, people have been instructed to wear masks – even after they have been vaccinated. Why? The lockdowns and mandates happened quickly. In the process, many peoples’ rights have been trampled and Orwellian measures have, unfortunately, manifested. Therefore, this section deals with a variety of covid-related subjects and is very well documented using official sources such as the CDC (wonder.cdc.gov/vaers.html), WHO, and more.
• Is the covid crisis being used to control people and our freedoms?
• Comparing all vaccine deaths from 1968 to 10-15-2021 & Covid 19 Vaccine
• How effective are masks against Covid?
• What is immunity debt and why is it important with covid?
• Covid 19 and the Pandemic of the Unvaccinated
• Reports of side-effect, injuries, and death soon after taking Covid 19 Vaccines
• Is natural immunity better than the covid vaccines?

• Graph: Covid vaccine effectiveness & percentages of infections in a population – all countries
• Table and Graph: Covid vaccine effectiveness & percentages of deaths in a population
• Graph: Covid vaccine effectiveness & percentages of deaths in a population – all countries
• Table: Covid source information for tables on vaccinations, infections, and deaths
• Graph: Comparing all vaccine deaths from 1968 to 10-15-2021 with Covid 19 Vaccine
